original_title: Maggie and the Ferocious Beast - Somewhere in Nowhere Land
overview: Come celebrate the power of friendship with the adventures of Maggie and her friends, the large and lovable Ferocious Beast and the steadfast and true pig, Hamilton Hocks.
tagline: In Nowhere Land, the sky is the limit!
title: Maggie and the Ferocious Beast - Somewhere in Nowhere Land
